content: That sounds like a plan! I'm really looking forward to the concert. By the way, I've been thinking about my recent concert-going streak and I realized that I've been to a few other shows recently. I found out that John Mayer was coming to town on May 10th and I bought tickets to that show, but I also attended a music festival featuring The Killers on April 17th and 18th, which was a blast.
